## User Interactions

### Interaction Flow
```mermaid
graph TD
    A[User lands on page] --> B{Logged in?}
    B -->|Yes| C[Show Dashboard]
    B -->|No| D[Show Login]
    C --> E[User clicks button]
    E --> F[Action performed]
```
